attributes.action: Vote no confidence in the way David Cameron is handling the immigration crisis.
attributes.background: David Cameron needs to take stronger action to stop people illegally entering the UK, causing criminal damage to our trucks and costing the country millions by contaminating the goods. Stop the hand outs to the illegal immigrants who get in and have them contained not disappear into society

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:   

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105402

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
